title: lazyLoad
body: Currently, LazyLoad ( https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ie/dn369270(v=vs.94) ) is implemented in IE and Edge, see support: https://caniuse.com/#feat=lazyload

comments.body: This also has a Feature-Policy https://www.chromestatus.com/feature/5641405942726656

Chrome intent to implement:
https://groups.google.com/a/chromium.org/forum/#!msg/blink-dev/czmmZUd4Vww/1-H6j-zdAwAJ
